```pddl
[
  '(:action gather
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (available ?location ?resource)
                    (not (collected ?agent ?resource))
                   )
    :effect (and
              (collected ?agent ?resource)
              (not (available ?location ?resource))
             )
  )',
  
  '(:action create-shelter
       :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - location)
       :precondition (and
                       (at ?agent ?location)
                       (material_collected ?agent tinder)
                       (not (shelter_built ?location))
                      )
       :effect (shelter_built ?location)
  )',
  
  '(:action create
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - location ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (material_collected ?agent ?resource)
                    (not (resource_created ?location))
                   )
    :effect (and
             (resource_created ?location)
             (not (material_collected ?agent ?resource))
            )
  )',
  
  '(:action start_fire
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?material - material)
    :precondition (and
                    (material_collected ?agent ?material)
                    (shelter_built beach)
                    (not (fire_started beach))
                   )
    :effect (fire_started beach)
  )',
  
  '(:action start
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
                    (available ?agent)
                    (prepared ?agent ?resource)
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (not (started ?location))
                   )
    :effect (and
              (started ?location)
              (not (prepared ?agent ?resource))
             )
  )',
  
  '(:action wet_tinder
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?tinder - tinder)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent water-source) (dry ?tinder))
    :effect (and (wet ?tinder) (not (dry ?tinder)))
  )',
  
  '(:action put_object_in_receptacle
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?object - object ?receptacle - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (holding ?agent ?object) (empty ?receptacle))
    :effect (and (in ?object ?receptacle) (not (holding ?agent ?object)))
  )',
  
  '(:action wet
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?receptacle - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent water-source) (or (dry ?item) (and (holding ?agent ?item) (empty ?receptacle))))
    :effect (and (or (and (wet ?item) (not (dry ?item))))
  )'
]
```
